EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Information (1343860519.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Information (1343860519.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Andy, You are very welcome! To answer your questions, to get set up depends on how long it takes to get a contract in place with your client. The actual enrollment process for you would just entail you filling out about 20 minutes of paperwork and then getting an I9 form signed by a notary. How long it takes you to get paid for the first time will depend on what the invoice frequency/net payment terms are with your client. Basically we do not pay you until we receive payment from your client, so when a payment comes it, we process it on the first available payroll. We process payrolls on Tuesday for a Friday pay date. If there is money in your business center on Tuesday, you would get paid on Friday, if there is not money in your business center on Tuesday, you do not get paid that week. In regards to how long you work with us, if you decide that you do not want to continue working with MBO there is no obligation to continue your relationship. You are working completely at will and may leave at any time. You can also work with us while working on other projects/jobs not being run through MBO. If you have additional questions about this please do not hesitate to reach out. Thanks!NicoletteFrom: Andy Witkowski [mailto:andy@whoisandy.net] Sent: Wednesday, August 01, 2012 10:21 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Information Hi Nicolette,
Thanks again for all the info. I just have two quick questions. First, how long does the process take from getting this set up to getting the first paycheck (roughly)? Also, what happens if I'm not happy or choose not to use MBO while still working (and the company I'm working for is ok with that)? Am I locked in using MBO for a certain amount of time?
Let me know when you get a chance.
Thanks, ------------------- Andy Witkowski 814.450.7039 http://whoisandy.net <http://whoisandy.net> andy@whoisandy.net <mailto:andy@whoisandy.net>Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Andy, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. Ive enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful as discussed: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCel9drGdh4%2FOQMajjmyyOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
- In addition we have a index of recorded Webinars that will cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCel9drGdh4%2FOQMajjmyyOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
- Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCel9drGdh4%2FOQMajjmyyOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. If you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCel9drGdh4%2FOQMajjmyyOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you again soon, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&bbentley@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCel9drGdh4%2FOQMajjmyyOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCel9drGdh4%2FOQMajjmyyOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
